original_text: When a man has sexual relations with a woman and there is an emission of semen, both of them must bathe with water, and they will be unclean till evening.
korean_text: 남녀가 동침하여 설정하였거든 둘 다 물로 몸을 씻을 것이며 저녁까지 부정하리라

sentences.original_text: When a man has sexual relations with a woman
sentences.korean_translation: 한 남자가 여자와 성관계를 가질 때

sentences.original_text: and there is an emission of semen
both of them must bathe with water
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 둘 다 물로 목욕해야 한다

sentences.original_text: and they will be unclean till evening
